‘Metro-Gold’ is a fast-burrowing, golden-shelled strain of Manila clam (Ruditapes philippinarum) selected for its exceptional performance in shallow substrate systems and striking appearance. This cultivar combines the classic sweet, buttery flavor of Manila clams with a distinctive golden-hued shell and rapid growth cycle ideal for urban aquaculture. Reaching a perfect plate size of 3-4 cm, ‘Metro-Gold’ actively filters water while developing in coarse sand or specialized substrate beds, making it both an efficient ecosystem component and a gourmet treasure.
